description: A simple overview of the most important Docker host and container metrics. (cAdvisor/Prometheus)

targets.expr: max(node_load1{job="node-exporter"} / count by(job, instance)(count by(job, instance, cpu)(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter"})) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{node_name=~"$node"}) by (node_name)

title: Docker and System Monitoring
